overview.proficient: You instead climb at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{normal speed}.

overview.base: You vertically leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{quarter speed} and horizontally leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed}.
overview.proficient: You instead vertically leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{half speed} and horizontally leap at @L[Core:Movement Speed]{full speed}.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Battle Cry Aura]{Battle Cry Aura} and @L[Ability:Battle Cry Resistance]{Battle Cry Resistance}.

system.endCondition: At the start of each of the targets' @L[Core:Turn]{turns}, they roll [[/roll 2d4]]. If either of these dice roll a 4, this effect ends.
You die or 1 minute passes without combat.

overview.base:
Can wield @L[Property:Two-Handed]{two-handed} weapons in one hand.
Note: @L[Property:AP]{AP} weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.

When you use @L[Ability:Hitman]{Hitman}, you may instead prepare an area up to 15 feet by 15 feet. In addition, you @L[Keyword:Resistance]{resist} being @L[Core:Surprise Rounds]{surprised} in towns and other urban areas. You also gain @L[Ability:Reactive Hide]{Reactive Hide}.
overview.proficient: The size of area you can prepare is (@L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P} + 2) × 5 feet by (@L[Core:Proficiency Bonus]{P} + 2) × 5 feet.
overview.fluent: The size of area you can prepare is (@L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F} + 2) × 5 feet by (@L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{F} + 2) × 5 feet.

overview.base: Your @L[Equipment:Foot]{feet} count as @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by them (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
You cannot use items in your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands}.

Target takes an additional [[/damage 5[lethal]]] @L[Core:Damage]{damage}. This also has all @L[Category:Damage types]{damage types} of the triggering @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack}. If the triggering @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack} was a critical hit, this deals 10 @L[Core:Damage]{damage} instead.

system.trigger: You have just hit a creature with an @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack} that dealt them @L[Core:Damage]{damage} from it.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Bite]{Bite} and become @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{fluent} in it. Additionally, your @L[Category:Equipment]{mouth} is @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.

Your @L[Equipment:Mouth]{mouth} counts as a @L[Category:Weapons]{weapon} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by it (although it cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with it and its damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].

You gain @L[Ability:Offensive Martial Arts]{Offensive Martial Arts} and become @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{fluent} in it. Additionally, your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} are @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}. If you have @L[Ability:Hind Claws]{Hind Claws}, you become @L[Core:Fluency Bonus]{fluent} in it as well and your @L[Equipment:Foot]{feet} are @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.

Your @L[Equipment:Hand]{hands} count as @L[Category:Weapons]{weapons} for the purposes of abilities that target or are delivered by (although they cannot be @L[Property:Shattered]{shattered} or @L[Property:Destroyed]{destroyed}). You may @L[Core:Attack Interaction]{attack} with them and their damage die is now [[/damage 1d4]].
